articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory.
					 Kim Jong Un enjoyed the bird's-eye view of the factory and said that the factory was remodeled in a splendid and fashionable style. Its appearance only helps one clearly notice the spirit of the officials and employees to devotedly implement without an inch of deflection the instruction given by leader Kim Jong Il to modernize it during his visit to the factory in the last period of his life.
					
					 He went round the monument to the field guidance given by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history which were newly arranged at the factory.
					
					 Watching the valuable historic data including photos of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the factory, he said that the factory developed into a treasure of the country which made positive contributions to improving the people's standard of living under the particular loving care of the great leaders.
					
					 He acquainted himself in detail with the production, management and operation of the factory while looking round its different places.
					
					 The officials and employees have made a lot of successes through a vigorous struggle to firmly consolidate the material and technical foundations of the factory which were provided by the President and Kim Jong Il, he said, and went on:
					
					 They are taking good care of modern production equipment associated with the warm loving care of Kim Jong Il like the apple of the eye and successfully doing the work for updating outdated equipment and making a good use of them.
					
					 He praised the officials and employees of the factory for devoting their creative wisdom to the drive to produce synthetic leather whose quality is as good as natural leather in physical nature and use such as tensile and bending strength and working hard to make a variety of bags in high demand among people.
					
					 Noting that the factory has an important duty and role to perform, he set forth the tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 He said the factory should put production on normal footing and sufficiently provide raw and other materials for the steady increase of the production as the factory has turned into a huge one capable of fully satisfying the nation's needs for synthetic leather and he took a benevolent measure to this end.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the factory after expressing expectation and belief that they would boost the production of quality synthetic leather and thus glorify forever the legendary love for the people shown by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the factory.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet, An Jong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Pak Myong Sun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Delegation of UNICEF Regional Office Here
articles.content:
Delegation of UNICEF Regional Office Here
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of East Asia and Pacific Regional Office of the UNICEF headed by Regional Director Karin Hulshof arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegation of UNICEF Regional Office Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegation of UNICEF Regional Office Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of East Asia and Pacific Regional Office of the UNICEF visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders after laying a bouquet before the statues.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, in congratulation of his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by Osunmakinde Edward Dolapo, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian Embassy here, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from S. M. Mironov, chairman of "A Just Russia", on July 1.
					 Mironov in the message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on behalf of the party and on his own behalf.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the DPRK reflects the support of the people for its leader who works hard to accelerate denuclearization and achieve peace and security in the region and the rest of the world, the message said, adding:
					
					 The relations of friendship and cooperation are linking "A Just Russia" with the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The message expressed belief that constructive dialogue would continue between the two parties.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and great success in his activities for the well-being of the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Players for 31st Olympic Games Confirmed in DPRK
articles.content:
Players for 31st Olympic Games Confirmed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Players for the 31st Olympic Games were confirmed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 According to the world standings recently issued by the International Judo Federation, Hong Kuk Hyon, Kim Sol Mi and Sol Kyong gained qualifications for the Olympiad.
					
					 Meanwhile, world champions Om Yun Chol, Ri Se Gwang and Kim Kuk Hyang and other sportspersons also qualified for the Olympiad.
					
					 The DPRK players will compete in 9 events including marathon, table-tennis, wrestling and archery.

articles.title: Primary School in Pyongyang Noted for Taekwon-Do Players
articles.content:
Primary School in Pyongyang Noted for Taekwon-Do Players
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Chollimagori Primary School in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, the DPRK came first in the primary schoolgirl Taekwon-Do event for the 42nd National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize.
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Mun Un Sun, its sports teacher, who said:
					
					 It is not so long since the Taekwon-Do hobby group came into being at the school but it has achieved many successes.
					
					 The school has paid deep attention to the group operation, determined to train its pupils to be well-prepared sons and daughters of the homeland of Taekwon-Do.
					
					 We teach them every Taekwon-Do movement in a scientific way, focusing on the speed and unity and showing videos on the games of the players who displayed the honor of the DPRK at international tournaments.
					
					 We will more effectively run the Taekwon-Do hobby group to keep the honor of the school.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Argument about "Vicious Cycle of Provocations" Slammed as Gangster-like Sophism
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Argument about "Vicious Cycle of Provocations" Slammed as Gangster-like Sophism
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities routinely argued that a "vicious cycle of provocations" should break down.
					 As an example, some days ago the boss of Chongwadae in south Korea pitched her voice for "discontinuation of the vicious cycle of provocation-dialogue-reward-repeated provocation" by all means, blustering that the "north's denuclearization" will be a battle of will.
					
					 Later, traitor Park Geun Hye reeled off hostile utterances she would break the chain of vicious cycle of provocation and reward to set up a new order and that repetition of provocation and reward will make the "north's denuclearization" a far-off thing. The minister of Foreign Affairs and other riff-raffs in south Korea repeated like a parrot what she uttered.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article dismisses the "vicious cycle of provocations" touted by the south Korean authorities as a gangster-like sophism to conceal their nature as senseless provokers. 
					
					 Anti-DPRK provocations constitute a chronic attribute of the south Korean puppet group, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is well known that the successive south Korean rulers plotted lots of anti-DPRK cases and committed a series of political and military provocations against the DPRK to escalate the tension between the north and the south.
					
					 Nonetheless, the Park group cried out for "discontinuation of the vicious cycle of provocations". It is an open declaration of their will to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last by misleading the public opinion at home and abroad to cover up their bellicose nature of heinous provokers.
					
					 With no paradox can the south Korean puppet group get rid of the responsibility for plunging the inter-Korean relations in the vicious cycle of confrontation and tension with reckless provocations against the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Exposes Servile Conduct of Japan Submitting to America
articles.content:
Minju Joson Exposes Servile Conduct of Japan Submitting to America
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The governor of Okinawa Prefecture, Japan recently gave vent to his rage over the American and Japanese authorities' refusal to meet the local residents' demands for the revision of the agreement on the status of U.S. forces in Japan, reduction of the U.S. military bases and prevention of recurrence of GIs' crimes.
					 The Japanese government deserves criticism since it made it a habit to read its American master's face in disregard of the wishes and requirements and interests of its people, a commentary of Minju Joson on Tuesday says, and continues:
					
					 In Japan the wishes and requirements and interests of the Japanese people are not prioritized but precedence is given to the American master's interests in politics.
					
					 Whenever GIs in Japan committed crimes, many Japanese vent their anger at them, demanding withdrawal of the U.S. forces from Japan.
					
					 At least the Japanese people demanded the agreement on the status of the U.S. forces in Japan be revised.
					
					 If Japan is a full-fledged sovereign state, its authorities should have taken proper steps, feeling a sense of disgrace over the fact that a great many Japanese have fallen victims to the GI criminals with their lives and dignities violated in peace time.
					
					 However, the Japanese authorities fail to say even a word, keen on pleasing the American master in disregard of the demands of its people, an expression of their deep-seated sycophancy and submission to the U.S.
					
					 Japanese politicians would be well advised to bear in mind the historical truth that sycophancy and dependence on foreign forces leads them to the ruin.

articles.title: Puppet Education Official's Remarks Insulting People Denounced by S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Puppet Education Official's Remarks Insulting People Denounced by S. Korean Body
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea in a statement on July 10 denounced an official concerned of the puppet Ministry of Education for praising the fascist dictatorial regime and insulting people.
					 The statement accused the policy planning official of the ministry of describing 99 percent of the population as dogs and pigs on July 7 and talking nonsense that the people should consolidate their status system of being "dogs and pigs."
					
					 The statement demanded him apologize for his outbursts and urged the authorities to fire him immediately and make apology.

articles.title: Projected Setting up of Biochemical Weapons Lab Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Projected Setting up of Biochemical Weapons Lab Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations in Pusan area of south Korea and its citizens staged a dynamic action against the moves of the U.S. forces in south Korea to set up a lab for biochemical weapons, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The preparatory committee for the Pusan citizens measure committee against the setting up of biochemical weapons lab in Pusan grouping more than 200 civic and social organizations in the city held a press conference outside the U.S. Embassy in Seoul on July 6 at which they demanded the U.S. forces immediately cancel their scenario for biochemical warfare.
					
					 The speakers accused the U.S. forces of mulling setting up the above-said lab in Pusan, pursuant to Jupiter Plan.
					
					 The U.S. forces are scheming to use the Pusan citizens as guinea-pigs, they stressed.
					
					 The organization in a message addressed to the U.S. Embassy demanded it open to public the contents of Jupiter Plan being concealed under the pretext of the unequal SOFA and the truth about the experiments of biochemical weapons and cancel at once the plan to install the lab at Dock No. 8 of Pusan Port.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Demands S. Korean Regime Participate in Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Demands S. Korean Regime Participate in Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A commentary of Son Se Yong, editorial member of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., was posted on Jaju Sibo, an internet paper of south Korea, on July 2.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The north called for holding a great national conference for reunification in Pyongyang or Kaesong before and after August 15 this year, proposing to hold a joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages from the north and the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula. This is arousing support and concern of compatriots at home and abroad.
					
					 The south Korean regime has no reason to reject the proposal for holding a great national conference for reunification.
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye regime of the south side rejected the proposal, talking about "sincerity" again.

articles.title: Kuwaiti Personage Praises Kim Il Sung's Exploits
articles.content:
Kuwaiti Personage Praises Kim Il Sung's Exploits
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwaiti committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung, released a statement on July 7 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The statement said that the demise of the President was a big loss to not only the Korean people but also other progressives in the world. It went on:
					
					 The President dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people till the last moments of his life since he embarked upon the road of the revolution.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership the DPRK turned into a strong fortress of independence against imperialism that no force dares provoke.
					
					 We pray for his immortality.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Czech Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Czech Political Figure
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Iri Vabr, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, posted on a website an article titled "Whole life of total dedication to the country and people" on July 8, the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The article said that though twenty two years have passed since HE Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, passed away, world progressive humankind is highly praising him as the eternal President of the DPRK and great man of the century.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 He dedicated his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					 His thought and practice were always for the country and people.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea centered on man for the first time in the history of human thought to provide mankind with a treasured sword for carving out their destiny.
					
					 He liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule by leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 During the whole period of leading the revolution, he put the interests of the country and people above all others.
					
					 He built and developed a party and government in line with the will and desire of the people and set an example of building socialism.
					
					 He also led the revolution and construction to victory for a long period.
					
					 He was absolutely supported and trusted by the people.
					
					 He energetically worked for the country's prosperity and people's happiness even during the last moments of his life.
					
					 His career was indeed the great one in which he always found himself among the people and shared joy and sorrow with them.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Russian Website
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Russian website Irkutskblogspot. ru posted an article titled "Traits of the popular leader" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un finding himself among the people and children on July 1 on the historic event of his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The article said that the boundless admiration of the Korean people for Kim Jong Un impresses the world society.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 How was it that Kim Jong Un who officially emerged on the stage of politics some years ago is enjoying such ardent admiration of the people?
					
					 Its answer should be found in the pictures of him taking warm loving care of the people.
					
					 His noble love for the people would be unthinkable without his transparent outlook on the people.
					
					 He regards the people as the most valuable entity in the world.
					
					 His motto is that officials and the leader exist for the people.
					
					 Love for the people serves as the starting point of all his thoughts and activities and as the highest principle and goal of politics pursued by him.
					
					 Under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un who is dedicating his all to the people, the DPRK is registering great success in improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 It is just the reality of the DPRK that the people's cheers are being heard from the modern cultural and entertainment bases built under his care.
					
					 That's why the people are ardently loving and absolutely trusting such leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Czech Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Czech Political Party
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Central Committee of the Communist Party-21 of the Czech Republic on its website on July 8, the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il during their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for devotedly defending and glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong.
					Al mirar el panorama de la fabrica, dijo que remodelaron muy bien la obra de reconstruccion y que la parte exterior de la fabrica me hace conocer bien el espiritu de los funcionarios y los empleados de materializar cabalmente el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien presento la tarea de modernizacion durante su visita hecha en los ultimos momentos de su vida.
					
					Tras ver el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, estuvo en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo las fotos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente dirigiendo en el terreno la fabrica y otros preciosos datos historicos, subrayo que bajo el particular amor de los grandes Lideres la fabrica se fortalecio como la empresa importante del pais que contribuye activamente a la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de produccion, administracion y gestion.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica lograron muchos exitos al librar una energica lucha por consolidar aun mas la base material y tecnica de la planta, preparada por los grandes lideres.
					
					En particular, cuidan como sus pupilas las modernas instalaciones impregnadas del gran amor y beneficio del Dirigente inclusive las de produccion de cuero sintetico por via humeda y hacen bien las labores para rehacer las instalaciones viejas a fin de usarlas eficientemente, dijo.
					
					Apunto que dedican sus inteligencias creadoras a producir el cuero sintetico de buena calidad, casi igual al cuero natural tanto en las resistencias de traccion y torcedura y otras caracteristicas fisicas como en el sentimiento de calidad y se empenan por elaborar diversos maletines que disfrutan de gran popularidad entre los habitantes.
					
					Enfatizando en la importancia del deber y el papel incumbidos ante la fabrica, presento las tareas que sirven de guia en la administracion y gestion de la fabrica.
					
					La fabrica se ha convertido ya en una empresa con gran capacidad que puede satisfacer suficientemente la demanda nacional sobre el cuero sintetico, subrayo y tomo las medidas necesarias diciendo que se necesita suministrar satisfactoriamente las materias primas y materiales para normalizar la produccion y aumentar sin cesar su cantidad.
					
					Expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica glorificaran para siempre el amor de los Lideres antecedentes al pueblo impregnado en la fabrica al producir mucho mas cuero sintetico, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el premier Pak Pong Ju, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Myong Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 Raul Castro Ruz, Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					El texto senala:
					
					Con motivo de su eleccion como Presidente del Comite de Estado en la cuarta sesion de la XIII Asamblea Popular Suprema le extiendo cordiales felicitaciones.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de UNICEF
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de UNICEF
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- Llego hoy a esta capital la delegacion de la Oficina Regional de Asia Oriental y Pacifico de UNICEF, encabezada por su director Karin Hulshof.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana informa sobre situacion a representantes diplomaticos de paises asiaticos
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana informa sobre situacion a representantes diplomaticos de paises asiaticos
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea organizo el dia 11 una reunion de informacion sobre la situacion para los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises asiaticos, acreditados en la RPDC, en relacion con que en estos dias, Estados Unidos lleva a la etapa imprevisible la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana cometiendo los ilegales y atroces actos hostiles de ofender atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC so pretexto del "problema de los derechos humanos".
					A la ocasion asistieron los embajadores extraordinarios y plenipotenciarios de Laos, Camboya, Malasia, Indonesia, Iran, la India y Vietnam y el encargado de negocios a.i. de Pakistan, acreditados en la RPDC.
					
					Choe Hi Chol, titular de la Direccion General de Asia y Oceania de MINREX de la RPDC, se refirio a la posicion de principios de la RPDC con respecto a las ultimas maniobras de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos para aislar y aplastar la RPDC.
					
					Recordo que el 6 de julio, el pais norteamericano se atrevio a ofender la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC publicando el informe del Departamento de Estado sobre el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC lleno de los datos falsos y la lista de los objetivos especiales de sancion del Departamento de Finanzas, y agrego que esto constituye una abierta declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC siendo un acto hostil peor que supera el antagonismo en el "problema de DDHH".
					
					Dijo que ya que EE.UU. paso el "linea roja" en la confrontacion total con la RPDC difamando la maxima dignidad de esta, no podemos estar con brazos cruzados.  Anadio que MINREX de la RPDC declaro el 7 de julio que si EE.UU. niega la demanda de la RPDC de retirar la presente sancion se interrumpiran de inmediato todos los espacios y vias de contacto diplomatico entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y se tomaran las medidas intransigentes para frustrar tajantemente los actos hostiles de EE.UU.
					
					Al mencionar que en contubernio con EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos siguen agravando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana decidiendo emplazar en el Sur de Corea el THAAD a pesar de la fuerte protesta de la RPDC y los paises circunvecinos, enfatizo que todos los paises asiaticos deben tratar con alta vigilancia y saber claramente el autor y el delincuente que danan la paz y la seguridad de la region, y no tienen que adherirse ni tomar parte en las acciones que perjudican la preservacion de la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Los representantes diplomaticos expresaron profundo entendimiento sobre el hecho de que la malvada politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC llevo a la extrema tension la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
